Half-Life 2 is a game that almost nobody can dislike. It is still fun it the 2020, and the story is awesome.

This game is an amazing classic. Even though it was released back in 2004, its still going strong thanks to its awesome game play, and story. The Half-Life series never fails to amaze me. This and the others in the franchise are definetly worth your money.

There's the time in video game history before HL2 and then there's the time after HL2. It's still the most influential thing that's happened to the gaming industry. I replayed it a couple of years ago, and guess what? It holds up.

Значит игра огонь! Все круто! Но один вам совет не проходите ревейнхольм с одной грави пушкой на максимальной сложности (я предупредил). Ну а так актуально даже сейчас, настоящая ЛЕГЕНДА. В заключение скажу одно: "проснитесь и пойте Мистер Фримен, проснитесь и пойте!"
The absolute gem of its time, I am playing this in 2020, and it still holds up!
I enjoyed this a lot. The combat felt nice, story felt present, there are more than two characters. However some areas felt empty, very minute gripe. Highly recommend 9/10
Cant blow up bodies with crowbar like first one bad game
이 게임을 처음했던 순간으로 돌아가고 싶다

真正的游戏史上的大革命，当初第一次玩是真的被这个画面震撼到了（那时候一直沉浸在C S 1.6中）不过当初并不知道半条命二是这个游戏（就连V社我当初都不知道，因为当时还小，只要有游戏玩就行），当初半条命一的三个人的故事（戈登、谢泼德、巴尼）让我觉得那是半条命的后续剧情，因为当时看了这样的画质觉得这游戏应该不是半条命的后续剧情，但是随着时间慢慢的了解，我才慢慢了解到这个游戏就是真正的后续作品，画面跨越式的大进步，从以前的“马赛克”画质，到现在的细节和物理特性炒鸡多的互动游戏，这种画面放到现在也感觉很不错，讲道理V社是真的nb，虽然不是FPS游戏的开端者，但是，画面的大改动，游戏的玩味真的很让人一直不腻，现在V社出了新作：《半条命：艾利克斯》，这游戏里面的细节是真的多到数不完，可以说V社真的很良心，但是，美中不足的一点，就是······不会数三（无奈摊手）希望有生之年真正的能玩到三吧······
i swear this is the game most enjoyed breaking and glitching
Just- just amazing, you HAVE to try it! With it's visuals and storyline, following from the original Half-Life lore!

Playing it again after 15/16 years, still greater than ever
I highly recommend Half Life 2, along with the other half life games. This is one of the greatest fps games that I have ever played, and the story will keep players on their toes as you play.
it is very not poop game lol xd
Bruh this game is actually a lot better than i thought this was gonna be. You can complete the game in a day if you try but the $10 is completely worth it.

It's been almost 20 years since Half Life 2 released. Ans it feels and plays just like any of these modern games that are available today, infact even better than them. This is truly on the best games of all time!

I can't believe this game was released 16 years ago. It is a masterpiece even for today's 2020 standards. I can recommend to replay this game. Thinking back when playing this game first time 15 years ago, being annoyed by lags and loading times, I can clearly say it is pure enjoyment on playing it a pc today. This was just fun. Epsiode 1 and 2 here I come.

(The following review has been created for all Half Life 2 parts and will be copied as a review for them)

*Review without spoilers*

I know it's 2020 and a lot of people played Half Life 2, or made/read a review, but it does'nt matter. 

When I've bought orange box I wasn't really knowing why people love Half Life so much. Then I've completed first HL2 game and I've started realizing. 

 When I've started playing, for about 1 hour I was repeating G-Man quote "Rise and shine mr Freeman, rise and shine", I just love G-Man. The graphics was amazing, when I was playing it I've didn't feel that this game was created in 2004. Voice actors were amazing too, they did great job. Sometimes it was annoying, because something I wasn't able to do anything, then I've realized I'm stupid because it was one of the easiest levels, but it happened only 2 times to me. Music in it was the best thing. When I've ended every episode of HL2 I've downloaded the soundtrack with the speed of light

I recommend Half Life 2 to everyone. Great story, good graphic, good music.
You've wasted time by doing anything that isn't playing Half-Life 2.
un jeux qui est dans le future (pour un jeux de 2004) juste génial rien a redire
Хороший сюжет, хорошая физика, хорошая графика
très sympa et pas si moche
This is the one of if not the best game ever made. Play it, do it now.

Heck yeah, I'd recommend it! It's Half-life 2, one of Valve's most iconic games! I'm so glad I have it!
Edit: I got both episodes from the Orange Box, which also gave me Portal 1.
An amazing game. Play it asap.
хорошая игра можно поиграть даже в 2020

Valve'nin yine esrarengiz serisi olan Half Life'nin ilk oyununu zevkle bitirmiştim gerek o pikselimsi grafikler gerek hikaye gerek oynanış olsun, o oyunun başarısından sonra ikinci oyun olarak çıkan Half Life 2 çeşit karakter ve npc düşmanlar olsun yeteri kadar güzel olmuş.
Heyecanlı bölümlerde kaçışlar ve zombileri gravity silahıyla alt üst ederek çeşitli fantazilerin zevkine mahkum olabilirsiniz.
Öneriyorum eğer önceden hiç oynamadıysanız oynayın..
Yıllardır ara ara kurup oynuyorum bıkılmıyor bu oyundan...
Gamer olabilmek için bitirilmesi gereken bir efsane, FPS'in babası
Amazing Game highly suggest for any type of gamer
